name: LuminPDF
description: LuminPDF is an awesome web application for viewing, editing & sharing PDF files in the cloud. It's currently have a very large amount of users

name: LuminTools
description: LuminTools provides a set of useful tools to help you to control your PDF document, such as convert, compress, split/merge or unlock, etc.

name: Camos App
description: A desktop application written in Electron, which can instantly print polaroid photos from your smartphone gallery, Instagram account or DSLR camera

name: Victoria's Secret
description: An online e-commerce website written in NodeJS, using ExpressJS, PassportJS, Stripe & Bootstrap

name: Movy
description: A React web application for fetching movies data using The Movie Database (TMDb) API
